creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of John L. and Ruth M. McKelvey
description: One of a pair of bowls painted with overglaze enamels depicting flowers; rounded bowls with tightly packed flowers and teal detailing on the exterior; interior has eleven butterflies painted on a white ground and a blue dragon on the interior, bottom; blue Greek key detail on foot
title: Bowl painted with overglaze enamels depicting flowers, one of a pair
